teamScheduler.title: Team Scheduler
teamScheduler.description: Smart platform to organize availability, shifts and events with AI suggestions. –60% planning time, +40% participation.

challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.description: A distributed team across multiple locations struggled to coordinate availability, shifts, and recurring events. The manual process required hours of weekly work and generated conflicts.
points: Manual availability collection via email and shared spreadsheets
Frequent shift conflicts and event overlaps
No real-time visibility on who is available and when
Low participation in recurring events due to lack of effective reminders

solution.title: The solution
solution.description: We designed and developed a platform that centralizes availability, shifts, and events. AI integration automatically suggests optimal slots and reduces conflicts.

features.title: Unified dashboard
features.description: Centralized view of availability, assigned shifts, and upcoming events. Filters by team, location, and role.

features.title: AI suggestions
features.description: The algorithm analyzes history and preferences to suggest optimal slots, avoiding conflicts and balancing workload.

features.title: Smart notifications
features.description: Automatic reminders via email and push, synced with external calendars (Google Calendar, Outlook).

features.title: Real-time updates
features.description: WebSocket for live updates when someone modifies availability or confirms an event.

results.title: Results
results.summary: The team recovered valuable hours every week and drastically reduced conflicts. Event participation increased thanks to timely notifications and simplified UX.

energyIntelligence.title: Energy Intelligence
energyIntelligence.description: Advanced energy monitoring and device detection via NILM models. –25% energy inefficiencies in 2 months.

challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.description: A group of facility managers had limited visibility into actual energy consumption. Existing data was aggregated and didn't allow identifying waste or anomalous devices.
points: Monitoring limited to global meters, without device-level detail
Inability to detect anomalies in real-time
No predictive system to optimize future consumption
Difficulty justifying investments in energy efficiency

solution.title: The solution
solution.description: We implemented a monitoring platform with NILM (Non-Intrusive Load Monitoring) models that identify individual devices from aggregated consumption. Predictive dashboard and real-time alerts.

features.title: NILM Engine
features.description: PyTorch models trained on real datasets to disaggregate consumption and detect active devices without additional sensors.

features.title: Predictive dashboard
features.description: D3.js visualizations with weekly consumption forecasts, anomaly alerts, and benchmarks between facilities.

features.title: Smart alerts
features.description: Automatic notifications when a device consumes above threshold or shows anomalous patterns.

features.title: TimeSeries DB
features.description: Optimized storage for high-frequency time series, with configurable retention policies.

results.title: Results
results.summary: Facility managers gained granular visibility into consumption, identifying hidden waste and optimizing investments. The infrastructure ROI paid for itself in less than 6 months.

aiWorkflowAssistant.title: AI Workflow Assistant
aiWorkflowAssistant.description: Intelligent automations for ticketing and knowledge base with Slack/Trello integrations. –50% repetitive ticket handling time.

challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.description: An internal support team handled hundreds of weekly tickets, many repetitive. The knowledge base was static and rarely consulted. Slack and Trello didn't communicate.
points: Repetitive tickets requiring identical manual responses
Static textual knowledge base, difficult to navigate
No synchronization between Slack (communication) and Trello (task tracking)
Time lost searching for solutions already provided in the past

solution.title: The solution
solution.description: We built an AI assistant that analyzes incoming tickets, suggests responses based on history, and automatically creates Trello tasks. Living knowledge base powered by Vector DB.

features.title: AI Triage
features.description: LLM analyzes incoming tickets, classifies by priority, and suggests draft responses based on semantic embeddings.

features.title: Living Knowledge Base
features.description: Vector DB indexes resolved tickets and documents. Semantic search with real-time contextual results.

features.title: Slack ↔ Trello sync
features.description: Slack commands that automatically create Trello cards, update status, and notify the team.

features.title: Auto-resolution
features.description: For common tickets (password reset, access), AI responds and closes autonomously if the solution is validated.

results.title: Results
results.summary: The support team recovered valuable time, drastically reducing repetitive ticket handling. The knowledge base became a daily consulted asset.

hostid.subtitle: A secure mobile identity platform built for seamless authentication and operational access.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: HostID is a mobile-first identity and access platform designed to simplify authentication for modern operational environments. It centralizes credentials, session management, and secure access flows inside a unified Flutter application — replacing fragmented login experiences with a single, reliable interface. The system is built as a standalone product of AtavicoLabs and powers internal and external authentication workflows, with an emphasis on security, speed, and ease of adoption.

item1.title: Unifying authentication workflows
item1.description: Organizations often rely on multiple disconnected login systems, causing friction and security inconsistencies.

item2.title: Reducing onboarding friction
item2.description: New users experience slow and error-prone setup due to manual credential distribution and outdated flows.

item3.title: Strengthening mobile security
item3.description: Teams needed secure, consistent access controls with biometrics, encrypted storage, and session management.

item4.title: Ensuring reliability in real-world conditions
item4.description: The app had to work seamlessly across platforms, weak network conditions, and varied operational contexts.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: HostID consolidates identity, authentication, and access flows into a mobile platform built with Flutter, offering a clean user experience and enterprise-grade security.

feature1.title: Mobile Identity Wallet
feature1.description: A unified interface where users manage organizational credentials, active sessions, and secure tokens — encrypted end-to-end.

feature2.title: Instant Access via QR / Secure Links
feature2.description: Fast login and device pairing using QR codes and short-lived secure links, removing the need for manual credential exchange.

feature3.title: Biometric Authentication Layer
feature3.description: Native biometrics (FaceID / TouchID) paired with robust local encryption ensure a frictionless and secure login experience.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.stack: Mobile: Flutter (Dart), secure storage, biometrics API · Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, JWT + rotating refresh tokens · Security: device-bound keys · TLS pinning · AES-256 encrypted vault · Platform: iOS, Android · CI/CD: GitHub Actions · Fastlane

cta.title: Ready to build your secure mobile product?
cta.description: Let's talk about how we can help you create a reliable, secure authentication experience for your users.

helixops.subtitle: An AI-powered workflow engine that automates operational processes and reduces repetitive work across teams.

meta.platformValue: Web Application · AI Automation · Backend Orchestrator

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: HelixOps is an AI-driven workflow automation platform designed to help operations teams streamline repetitive processes, reduce manual overhead, and increase accuracy at scale. Built as an enterprise-ready system, HelixOps integrates seamlessly with existing tools and internal APIs, orchestrating tasks through a combination of event triggers, business rules, and LLM-driven reasoning. The platform offers clean dashboards, status monitoring, and a highly scalable backend orchestrator capable of handling thousands of concurrent workflows.

item1.title: Fragmented operational workflows
item1.description: Teams relied on multiple tools, spreadsheets, and manual checks — slowing execution and increasing the chance of error.

item2.title: High operational overhead
item2.description: Repetitive tasks such as approvals, data validation, content classification, and routing consumed significant staff time.

item3.title: Lack of visibility into process performance
item3.description: Managers had no unified way to monitor workflows or measure bottlenecks.

item4.title: Need for intelligent automation without replacing existing systems
item4.description: Any new solution had to integrate smoothly into the existing stack, without disrupting daily operations.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: HelixOps introduces a centralized automation layer that connects people, systems, and tasks within a single intelligent engine.

feature1.title: AI Reasoning Engine
feature1.description: A hybrid system combining rule-based workflows with LLM-powered classification, routing, and decision support. The engine determines next steps, validates data, triggers alerts, and ensures consistency across processes.

feature2.title: Visual Workflow Builder
feature2.description: A drag-and-drop interface that allows teams to model processes, define triggers, and configure AI actions — without writing code.

feature3.title: Real-Time Monitoring Dashboard
feature3.description: Operational leaders gain visibility into workflow throughput, task duration, error rates, and system health through a clean, minimal analytics dashboard.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.stack: Frontend: Next.js, React, Tailwind, Zustand · Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, WebSocket task streams · AI: LLM routing, embeddings, vector DB (pgvector), fine-tuning pipeline · Orchestration: Event-driven microflows · retry policies · audit logging · Deployment: Docker · GitHub Actions · Load-balanced Node clusters

cta.title: Ready to streamline your operations with intelligent automation?
cta.description: Let's talk about how we can help you build scalable AI-driven workflows for your team.

pulseshift.subtitle: A mobile-first scheduling platform that helps teams manage workforce availability, shifts, and assignments powered by AI.

meta.teamValue: UX Design · Mobile Engineering · Backend · AI

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: PulseShift is a mobile workforce scheduling solution designed for teams that need to coordinate people, time, and availability across dynamic operational environments. Built with Flutter, it provides a fast and intuitive experience for workers and managers, enabling real-time updates, automated shift assignments, and clear communication. The platform integrates an AI scheduling engine that analyzes team availability, constraints, and workload to generate optimal shift proposals — reducing planning time and improving fairness.

item1.title: Fragmented shift management
item1.description: Teams relied on WhatsApp messages, spreadsheets, and manual calls to coordinate availability.

item2.title: Lack of transparency for workers
item2.description: Employees struggled to keep track of assigned shifts, updates, and changes, leading to confusion.

item3.title: High workload for schedulers
item3.description: Managers spent hours balancing constraints, preferences, conflicts, and last-minute changes.

item4.title: Need for real-time updates
item4.description: Operational environments required instant sync across devices to avoid outdated schedules.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: PulseShift provides a unified mobile platform for managing shift assignments, availability, and scheduling workflows — designed for clarity and operational reliability.

feature1.title: Availability & Shift Management
feature1.description: Workers can quickly set availability across days and time slots, while managers assign and adjust shifts with immediate feedback.

feature2.title: AI Scheduling Engine
feature2.description: The system generates optimal shift distributions based on availability, role requirements, conflicts, and fairness criteria. Schedulers can accept, refine, or regenerate proposals.

feature3.title: Real-Time Sync & Notifications
feature3.description: Changes to shifts propagate instantly across all users, with clear notifications and audit logs for transparency.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.stack: Mobile: Flutter (Dart), Provider/Bloc, local caching, offline mode · Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, WebSocket sync layer, REST API · AI: Constraint solver + heuristic scheduling engine + LLM for conflict explanation · Notifications: Push (FCM/APNS), event-driven alerts · Deployment: Docker · GitHub Actions · multi-env staging

insightgrid.subtitle: A real-time analytics platform that transforms operational data into actionable insights through fast dashboards and AI-driven analysis.

meta.teamValue: UX Design · Frontend · Backend · Data Engineering · AI

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: InsightGrid is a real-time analytics dashboard designed for teams who need fast, reliable access to operational metrics. The platform aggregates data streams, computes KPIs at scale, and provides interactive visualizations built for clarity and speed. With an AI insights layer, InsightGrid surfaces anomalies, trends, and predictive indicators — enabling teams to make informed decisions without digging through raw data. Designed with a technical, minimal interface, the platform handles high-volume data while maintaining exceptional responsiveness.

item1.title: Disconnected data sources
item1.description: Teams had data coming from multiple systems, making it difficult to maintain a unified view of operations.

item2.title: Slow dashboards under peak load
item2.description: Existing tools couldn't handle real-time updates or high query frequency without performance degradation.

item3.title: Lack of actionable insights
item3.description: Users had metrics but no interpretation: anomalies, trends, and correlations were often missed.

item4.title: Need for clean, technical UX for data-heavy workflows
item4.description: The team required a dashboard that felt powerful yet minimal, without overwhelming charts.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: InsightGrid centralizes real-time data ingestion, fast queries, and AI-driven insight generation into a single analytics platform.

feature1.title: Real-Time Metrics & High-Performance Charts
feature1.description: Using a Timescale/PostgreSQL backend, the platform streams fresh data to users, rendering updates efficiently and without page reloads.

feature2.title: AI Insights & Anomaly Detection
feature2.description: A lightweight AI layer identifies unusual patterns, predicts potential risks, and highlights key changes.

feature3.title: Modular Dashboard Layout
feature3.description: Users can compose and customize dashboards with tiles for KPIs, graphs, tables, and trend indicators — all within a clean, minimal UI.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.stack: Frontend: Next.js, React, Tailwind, Recharts / custom visualizations · Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL + TimescaleDB, Redis caching · Real-Time: WebSocket update streams · AI: anomaly detection (z-score, isolation forest), LLM insight summaries · Deployment: Docker, auto-scaling runtimes, CDN caching for static assets

cta.description: Let's talk about how we can help you build a fast, powerful analytics platform for your team.

flowcanvas.subtitle: A real-time collaborative whiteboard that helps teams think, plan, and create together — with instant multi-user sync and a fast custom canvas engine.

meta.teamValue: UX/UI · Frontend Engineering · Real-Time Systems · Infrastructure

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: FlowCanvas is a real-time collaborative whiteboard designed for product teams, designers, and strategists. The platform enables multi-user drawing, diagramming, note-taking, and brainstorming — all synchronized instantly across devices. Built with a custom canvas rendering engine and a WebSocket real-time layer, FlowCanvas delivers a smooth, low-latency experience even with multiple simultaneous collaborators. Its minimal UI keeps focus on the content, while powerful tools enable deep ideation sessions.

item1.title: Enabling collaboration without latency
item1.description: Teams needed instant visual sync: cursors, shapes, notes, and drawings had to update in real time for every participant.

item2.title: Creating a high-performance canvas
item2.description: The system had to handle vector tools, text, shapes, and freehand drawing without stutter.

item3.title: Preventing conflicts between editors
item3.description: When multiple users modify the same area, operations must be merged gracefully.

item4.title: Offering a clean, focused UX
item4.description: Many whiteboard tools feel cluttered; the team wanted a minimal environment that encouraged creativity.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: FlowCanvas delivers a fast, collaborative workspace with a custom engine tuned for multi-user interaction.

feature1.title: Real-Time Multi-User Sync
feature1.description: All edits, shapes, notes, and drawings are synchronized instantly using WebSocket streams and delta-based updates. Each participant sees others' cursors live — creating a shared spatial awareness.

feature2.title: High-Performance Canvas Engine
feature2.description: A custom rendering layer handles vector tools, freehand strokes, zoom/pan, snapping, grouping, and transformations — all optimized for speed.

feature3.title: Collaboration Tools & History
feature3.description: FlowCanvas includes comments, annotations, sticky notes, and a version timeline that lets users explore or revert changes.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.stack: Frontend: React, Next.js, Canvas/WebGL, Zustand, custom rendering engine · Real-Time: WebSocket sync layer, delta updates, presence tracking, cursor broadcasting · Backend: Node.js, Redis pub/sub, PostgreSQL · Collaboration: CRDT-inspired merge logic, version history, operation log · Deployment: Docker, scalable node clusters

cta.description: Let's talk about how we can help you create a powerful, real-time collaborative experience for your team.
